customer_review: For such a low price, I was impressed by the quality of this product! I just had surgery and have limited use of my arms for the next few weeks - this leash lets me walk my 40lb pit who pulls like no other. Easy to use. I'm thrilled!

customer_review:
The leash is way too short and coiled way too tight to be useful! Attached it to my waist (I’m 5’4) my dogs couldn’t move to my sides because the leashes were too tight and the loops were in the front (causing me to literally walk over them when attempting to use this) 



Gave this two stars because I use the belt still, but with different leashes and to carry other things. Super useful if you’re thrifty!
